titles.title: Federal Payments Option Act
To amend section 3332 of title 31, United States Code, to allow recipients of Federal payments to "opt out" of the direct deposit requirements under the EFT '99 program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 8/5/1998--Introduced. Federal Payments Option Act - Amends Federal monetary law to enable recipients of Federal payments to notify the Secretary of the Treasury in writing of their choice not to receive such payments by means of electronic funds transfer (under the EFT '99 program).
